name: OnTheCase
description:
UPDATE: DOWNLOAD WIN, MAC AND LINUX BINARIES FROM HERE: https://aigua1977.itch.io/onthecase-binaries

New York City, the Prohibition era.  You are a private eye.   A man is missing, and you need to solve the mystery.  Of course, you can't hope anyone will help you, not even the Police.  On the contrary, you have to do their job.   Last but not least, remember:  Trust No One...

You need to install Python 3.7.7 and pygame to run this game:

https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-377/

python -m pip install -U pygame --user

Then run main.py.

Apologies, we don't have the Windows or Mac installer working yet (hopefully soon).
